original_title: Three arrested with ‘Ice’ worth Rs. 100 mn during raid in Colombo
original_body_lines: Three persons were arrested with a stock of narcotics by the Police Special Task Force (STF), during a raid carried out in Colombo.
Accordingly, 09 kilograms of crystal methamphetamine (‘Ice’), with an estimated street value of around Rs. 100 million, were seized.
